caldavtest.description: Test address book/group sharing and cached home sync tokens

test.description: Check user2 notification collection and get invite uid
user2 replies ACCEPTED and deletes notification
add 2 vcards to user1 address book
share user2 address book with user1
Check user1 notification collection and get invite uid
user1 replies ACCEPTED and deletes inviteUID from notification collection
add 2 vcards to user2 address book
Look for options header tag on principal

test-suite.name: simple reports - empty token - no props
simple reports - diff token - no props - addressbook depth:1
simple reports - diff token - no props - home depth:infinity

test.description: clear user1 address book and unshare user2 address book
share user3 address book with user1
Check user1 notification collection and get invite uid
user1 replies ACCEPTED and deletes inviteUID from notification collection
add 2 vcards to user3 address book
share user4 address book with user1
Check user1 notification collection and get invite uid
user1 replies ACCEPTED and deletes inviteUID from notification collection
add 2 vcards to user4 address book

test-suite.name: simple reports - diff token - props - home depth:infinity
simple reports - diff token - delete/create addressbook - home depth:infinity

test.description: share user3 address book with user1
Check user1 notification collection and get invite uid
user1 replies ACCEPTED and deletes inviteUID from notification collection

test-suite.name: simple reports - diff token - no props - home depth:1
